body.name: cimetech Wireless Keyboard, Compact Full Size Wireless Computer Keyboard 2.4G Ultra-Thin Sleek Design for Windows, Computer, Desktop, PC, Notebook, Laptop, Mac - Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 45 mins
features: 【Slim and Ergonomic Design】 The slim wireless keyboard has a tilt angle for the great typing position. Sweat-resistant, skin-friendly finish wireless mouse in contoured shape would provide hours of work comfortably. The full size wireless keyboard type fast with numeric keypad and instant access your music,internet,e-mail,volume,etc by multi-media hot keys.(The hot-keys not fully compatible with Mac System)

【Less Noise & Profile Keys Typing】 The wireless keyboard's noise reduced keys will allow you to do your job without missing a sound or disturbing your environment. The wireless keyboard features auto sleeping mode, plus on/off switches to help conserve battery use, you can go for months without the hassle of changing the batteries.(AA batteries are not included)

【Fast Operation 2.4G Wireless Plug and Play】 Simply connect both your portable wireless keyboard with one USB receiver(The nano receiver just snap in the storage of keyboard near battery compartment.) without any software and then enjoy a strong and reliable wireless connection up to 10 meters(33 ft) away with virtually no delays or dropouts.
【Compatible Wireless Keyboard】 Works with your PC, desktop computer, laptop or notebook. Compatible with Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 /10 operating systems.

【Sales support】 Our wireless keyboard products provide customers with perfect technical support, our customer service support team can quickly deal with any technical problems when you encounter problems.

【diseño delgado y ergonómico】 el delgado teclado inalámbrico tiene un ángulo de inclinación y es adecuado para una excelente posición de mecanografía. El ratón inalámbrico con forma de contorno antisudor y pro - piel puede funcionar cómodamente durante horas. El teclado inalámbrico de tamaño completo está equipado con un teclado digital que permite un acceso rápido a la música, internet, correo electrónico, volumen, etc. a través de teclas calientes multimedia. (las teclas calientes no son completamente compatibles con el sistema mac)

【reducción de ruido y mecanografía de teclas de perfil】 las teclas de reducción de ruido del teclado inalámbrico le permiten hacer su trabajo sin perder el sonido o interferir con el entorno. El teclado inalámbrico tiene un modo de sueño automático, junto con un interruptor que ayuda a ahorrar el uso de la batería, puede prescindir de cambiar la batería durante unos meses. (excluyendo baterías aa)

【operación rápida 2.4G Plug and Play inalámbrico】 basta con conectar su teclado inalámbrico portátil a un receptor USB (el receptor Nano solo necesita insertar el espacio de almacenamiento del teclado cerca de la Caja de baterías), sin ningún software, para disfrutar de una conexión inalámbrica potente y confiable a 10 metros (33 pies) de distancia, sin apenas retraso ni desprendimiento.
【teclado inalámbrico compatible】 para su computadora, escritorio, computadora portátil o computadora portátil. Compatible con el sistema operativo Windows XP / vista / 7 / 8 / 10.

【soporte de ventas】 nuestros productos de teclado inalámbrico brindan a los clientes un soporte técnico perfecto, y nuestro equipo de soporte de servicio al cliente puede manejar rápidamente cualquier problema técnico cuando encuentre problemas.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Multimedia Function Keys The wireless keyboard with QWERTY layout is fully functional and meets your daily needs. 3 indicator lights are easy to see. 12 multimedia shortcuts allow quick access to homepage, volume and more

Scissor Switch X-shaped structure, moderate key strength and short key travel compared to other noisy keyboards Ultra Slim & Compact Ultra-thin, compact design, not take up much space and fits easily into laptop bag, portable keyboard Energy Saving If there is no operation after 10 minutes, the combination will automatically switch to sleep mode to save energy. Convenient Plug & Play The USB receiver allows you to connect keyboard to your computer by simply plugging in the USB stick.
Use for Multiple Occasions Easy to store in a laptop bag, perfect for office home

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Light but Super Responsive Keyboard
reviews.reviewText: My workstation does not have much space. I can hardly keep a keyboard and a notepad side by side here. So, using a wired keyboard was becoming a problem as I could not move it when I needed to write. So, I tried this Bluetooth keyboard, and I have to say, I am impressed with it. First of all, the price is really catchy. Every keyboard I have seen online is around $35, so buying this one was a to-go. I have spent almost two months with it, and my typing experience is awesome. It is not clicky at all and does not give the fatigue of typing for a long time. The metallic color is also pretty attractive. It's responsive to my typing command with no latency issue. I have not changed the battery yet, so it is a good thing that it does not take much juice to continue working. It has a bevel-shaped stand at the top, which keeps the keyboard tilted and makes typing easier. Overall, it's a good keyboard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well as a compact keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I picked this up to keep at my desk at home for the ~20% of the time I WFH. I don't have a lot of space, so a compact keyboard with no wires was the ideal.This keyboard connects quickly with the included dongle. I'm not an especially fast typist, but I have noticed it occasionally misses a key - I'm not sure if this is due to the connection or the keys are just a bit stiffer than what I'm accustomed to. Nevertheless, it works fine for it's intended purpose - if you're looking for something higher end, expect to pay a bit more for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plug & Play & Go!
reviews.reviewText: Easy setup! Plugs in quick, computer recognized it immediately, off I went. I appreciate the compact size with full range, a great go-to keyboard for setting up at the coffee shop or kitchen table. I like the rolled top for a good angle and sleek look. Solid keyboard overall!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love my new handsome cordless keyboard
reviews.reviewText: Love this keyboard! It is smaller than my last keyboard which is the usual size for a keyboard. And my old one wasn't cordless. What a difference. It looks so much better without a cord. Since, it was smaller I examined it to make sure it had all the keys my last one did and to see what was different about it. It does have all the same keys. What they did was shorten some of the keys like the backspace and the actual space bar and some others. It doesn't bother me any. I think it's a handsome keyboard. And it takes up less space which I needed desperately because I have too much stuff on my desk all around my keyboard. The color isn't black but instead a gray/silver color. But the actual keys are black. Oh, and it was so easy to set up. Since I never had one before I was a little worried about this part. When I got it and opened the box a tiny usb piece fell out of the back into my hands. (be careful it doesn't drop onto the ground where you can lose it) It is located in the back in the empty battery compartment. The lid for my battery compartment wasn't closed properly and is the only reason it fell out. It takes 2 double A batteries. Put the batteries in and then put the usb piece into any usb port you have on your computer in the front or back it does not matter. Turn the little switch on the keyboard on and that is all. It started working! So far, I love it. It's perfect for me and I am very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice size for full-sized functionality, keys are flat and texture is pretty meh
reviews.reviewText: Out of the box I had some connection issues and had to follow the instructions to unpair and repair the device with the USB wifi dongle (hold two buttons down), and it eventually worked better. Also some of the function keys like the email and home buttons seemed to freeze the keyboard when connected to a windows computer and I had to repair it again. The media controls work fine tho.Overall a decent keyboard but I wouldn't want to use it as my daily driver. I got it to use occasionally with my xbox, and it's fine for that. It's a nice size and fits in my TV stand drawer easily, plus I can use it on a coffee table with space next to it for a mouse.The keys are flat on top (not cupped) so my hands kind of skate around on top while I'm typing, and the texture of the keys is slightly rough but surprisingly slick. I do get keypresses that don't register when pressing the edge of a key, and especially if pressing the bottom 25% of the space bar where it just rotates and doesn't actually press the switch. It reminds me of a laptop keyboard I didn't really like because I had to press a bit harder than I'm used to, and also press directly in the center of the keys every time. As a fast typer, this kind of extra focus required to ensure accurate keystroke registration slowly drives me insane after typing for a while, as I'm used to mechanical desktop keyboards.Personally I use Eneloop rechargeable batteries in everything, so I prefer that this uses AAs and isn't rechargeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This keyboard isn't bad, but it could be better in a few ways. The positive, simple plug and play, the keys are quite receptive, and the keyboard feels semi durable. The negative, there's very little riser on the keyboard making it feel like a laptop keyboard instead of desktop, further along that line, the key size and locations of other buttons reinforce the feeling of a laptop keyboard, finally, it's got some weight to it, heavier than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good
reviews.reviewText: I've had nothing but good experiences with this keyboard so far- but like any new keyboard, it took a little getting used to.It's durable enough to handle day-to-day and set up pretty easily. The keys are responsive and it does everything I'd like it to do- at least so far.If you just want a good, basic, wireless keyboard for a good price- this is a good option!
